title: House of Cuts
description: When the dismembered bodies of managers begin turning up inside a small town’s only superstore, reporter Hillary Broome’s stories on the grisly murders catapult her byline into the national limelight and threaten to expose the shameful secret that could ruin her career—as well as bring her to the crazed killer’s attention. Hillary must connect with detective Eddie Kiffin before the insane cutthroat finishes off a woman who has come to hold a special place in Hillary’s heart.-----------HOUSE OF CUTS builds towards a powerful climax, reminiscent of SILENCE OF THE LAMBS. --Susan Rushton, Auburn Journal ColumnistWould make a great movie! --Zoe Keithley, Story Workshop® master teacher
author: June Gillam
